item.title: Portforwarding - need help i forgot a small part how to do
item.dc:creator: @we_rushed_god we rushed god
item.description:
@we_rushed_god wrote:

you create a static ip address, i suggest using portforwarding.com guide on how to make one, follow the guides on that website, then with the static ip address u made u go into your router then applications and gaming (if its linksys) then for the name make it like RSPS the port number 43594, enable the port and next to enable you will see something like 192.165.1.[ ] fill the box with the last digits of your static ip (do this entire step twice one where the port is UDP and TCP) Not done yet, you go to your fire wall, then go to exceptions(one of the tabs) click add port. the name will be RSPS and the port 43594 make the port type UDP, then make another copy of it but instead of picking UDP pick TCP and then your port will be accessable by other players!!
HOPE THIS HELPS(ITS VERY DETAILED)

Read full topic
